hero.title: 嗨，我是查尔斯！
hero.p0: 全栈向导、学生和企业家
hero.p1: 未来的 SWE 实习生
hero.des0: I'm a 3rd year computer science specializing in SWE, AI, and business at the University of Waterloo.
hero.des1: I love collaborating in teams to create high-quality and sophisticated software.
hero.des2: My preferred tech stack involves React, NodeJS, and GraphQL, though I'm always excited to flex my other muscles.
hero.des3: I'm currently learning about genetic algorithms and developing a housing aggregator for students at my University.

projects.title: 项目
projects.description: 以下是我领导和开发的一些我最喜欢的项目。它们不仅编写代码非常有趣，而且其中许多现在为真人提供了实用工具！

msmr.subtitle: 与瑞尔森大学签约
msmr.description: Jenny Liu 博士的 MSMR 品牌下的博客和研究共享网络应用程序

uwcribs.subtitle: Waterloo Student Housing Aggregator
uwcribs.description: Instead of scrolling through Facebook endlessly every term to find a suitable place to live, we aggregated all available listings in a search engine to meet your specific needs.

productify.subtitle: Virtual Study Space Bot
productify.description: Live on Discord! This web app leverages social interaction and gamification to promote effective studying by individuals and groups.

skills.title: 技能
skills.description: 虽然我总是很高兴使用最新和最伟大的技术，但这些是我在构建任何项目时尝试和测试的工具。

experience.title: 经验
experience.description: 这些公司有幸让我加入他们的团队。希望你们的公司也能加入。

contact.title: 要连接吗？
contact.description: 我真的很感激人们不遗余力地与您取得联系。我会确保尽快回复您！

footer: 用 NextJS、TailwindCSS 和很多 ❤️ 制作
